item.title: California's congressional delegation calls for federal wildfire aid
item.description: California's colossal congressional delegation is pressing Republican and Democratic leaders in Congress for wildfire recovery aid.

item.title: Reconstruction of D.C.'s Black Lives Matter Plaza to begin next week
item.description: Work to alter D.C.'s Black Lives Matter Plaza on 16th Street NW will begin Monday, with that phrase expected to be removed.

item.title: Activists vandalize Trump golf report over comments on emptying out Gaza
item.description: Pro-Palestinian activists said Saturday they have vandalized one of U.S. President Donald Trump's golf resorts in Scotland in response to his proposal...

item.title: Speaker Johnson plows ahead with Trump-backed spending deal
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson unveiled his yearlong government funding extension including a defense spending boost and agency cuts.

item.title: Tribes and Native American students sue over Bureau of Indian Education firings
item.description: Three tribal nations and five Native American students say in a lawsuit that the Trump administration has failed its legal obligations to tribes when ...
